name: jackbooted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
wearing jackboots (= long leather boots as worn by soldiers or police who are thought of as violent or cruel): a jackbooted thug Jackbooted guards marched them off to camps. See
jackboot
More examplesFewer examplesIt was hard to spot the jackbooted police that some would have us believe are standing on every street corner.The students were protesting about their country's jackbooted military regime.Jackbooted soldiers marched behind them.
